visionValues.title: Our Vision & Values
visionValues.description: These core values guide our actions, shape our community, and define the spirit of our samaj.

values.title: Ahimsa (Non-Violence)
values.description: Peace begins with every thought and action.

values.title: Seva (Service)
values.description: Selfless giving is our way of life.

values.title: Ekta (Unity)
values.description: Together, we are stronger as one samaj.

values.title: Shiksha (Education)
values.description: Knowledge is the foundation of faith.

values.title: Karuna (Compassion)
values.description: Love and kindness guide our every step.
